alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 12 at 8:20AM CDT until July 12 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 476 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST KANSAS DONIPHAN IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSOURI DAVIESS GRUNDY HARRISON MERCER PUTNAM IN NORTHEAST MISSOURI SCHUYLER IN NORTHWEST MISSOURI ANDREW ATCHISON MO BUCHANAN DEKALB GENTRY HOLT NODAWAY WORTH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, BETHANY, CLARKSDALE, COUNTRY CLUB VILLA, CRAIG, DOWNING, ELWOOD, FAIRFAX, FOREST CITY, GALLATIN, GLENWOOD, GRANT CITY, GREENTOP, HIGHLAND, JAMESPORT, KING CITY, LANCASTER, MAITLAND, MARYVILLE, MAYSVILLE, MERCER, MOUND CITY, OREGON, OSBORN, PRINCETON, QUEEN CITY, ROCK PORT, SAVANNAH, ST. JOSEPH, ST. JOSEPH AIRPORT, STANBERRY, STEWARTSVILLE, TARKIO, TRENTON, TROY, UNION STAR, UNIONVILLE, AND WATHENA.
